item.name: Mira
item.description: The currency issued by and circulates in Mirroria. Can be used on vending machines, service stations, restaurants, and other facilities across Mirroria.

item.name: Fortress Exoskeleton Shard
item.description: A new exoskeleton developed by District 7 R&D that provides excellent stat support.

item.name: Universal Combat Parts II
item.description: Universal combat parts circulating in the black market in secret. Considering their performance and price, one may feel they're ripped off by the merchants selling them.
source: Recycle a Combat Engine of the same grade

item.name: Elementia
item.description: It seems to be a special organ that reacts to various elements, and is also an unsolved mystery about deep sea Abyssants.

item.name: Crystamax Core
item.description: It's said to be the source of energy for Grayspace Entities, and its significance is extraordinary.

item.name: Sea Meme
item.description: Genetic information that organisms have evolved to adapt to the deep-sea environment.

item.name: Gray Matter Chunk
item.description: Some gray matter peeled off from the bodies of Grayspace Entities.
source: Confounding Abyss: Defeating beastly Grayspace Entities.

item.name: Disintegrated Core
item.description: The disintegrated core that supports Haboela's actions, which offers great research value.
source: Grand Sea Volcano Entrance: Defeat Haboela

item.name: Haboela's Giant Horn
item.description: Haboela's iconic horn. Acquiring it will show your strength.
source: Grand Sea Volcano Entrance: Defeat Haboela

item.name: Disintegrated Gravel
item.description: Disintegrated debris after the volcanic eruption. They hit the prey with a strong heat flow that impacted the prey.
source: Grand Sea Volcano Entrance: Defeat Haboela

item.name: Veron
item.description: Old Mirroria currency that is already out of circulation. It's said that you can still use these coins on some gachapon machines.
